-ics.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the scientific study or use of something
-ics.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: electronics  (=the study or making of electronic equipment)
-ics.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the actions typically done by someone with particular skills
-ics.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: used to make nouns out of words ending in -ical or -ic
-ics.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: the acoustics  (=sound qualities) of the hall
